summary: Added intelligent TODO grouping to /learn command. New Step 7.5 analyzes selected TODOs for semantic topics using key terms, file sections, and action types. Updated Step 8.4 with grouped/combined/separate task creation modes with effort scaling (1h base + 30min per item).
